other_tests.findings: Opening pressure during the procedure was more than 40 cm H2O.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After resetting the valve to a low pressure, an opening pressure of 45 cm H2O was measured following revision of the shunt.

other_tests.procedure_name: Rescue Operation for Optic Canal Decompression
other_tests.findings: The procedure failed to save his vision.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Compared with his last CT scan, there was a significant increase in the size of the frontal horns of the lateral ventricles.
